subject: Mobile app crashes on login
body: The mobile app keeps crashing whenever I try to log in with my Google account. This has been happening for the past 3 days. I've tried reinstalling the app but the issue persists. Very frustrating!

subject: Cannot export data to Excel
body: I need to export my data to Excel but the export button is not working. When I click it, nothing happens. This is blocking my weekly reporting.

subject: Dashboard loading very slow
body: The dashboard takes over 30 seconds to load. This is making it impossible to use the product effectively. Our team of 50 users is experiencing this issue.

subject: Love the new analytics feature!
body: Just wanted to say that the new analytics dashboard is amazing. The insights are exactly what we needed. Great work!

subject: Integration with Slack not working
body: We set up the Slack integration yesterday but we're not receiving any notifications. Checked all the settings and everything looks correct.

subject: Mobile app crashes on Android
body: Similar to another ticket I saw - the mobile app crashes immediately when opening on Android 12. This is affecting our entire sales team.

subject: Need bulk edit functionality
body: Would love to have the ability to bulk edit multiple items at once. Currently having to edit items one by one which is very time consuming.

subject: API rate limits too restrictive
body: The API rate limits are too low for our use case. We're hitting the limit within the first hour of operation. Can we get this increased?

subject: Cannot delete old projects
body: Trying to clean up old projects but the delete button is grayed out. Getting an error message saying 'Cannot delete projects with active data'. How do I proceed?

subject: Dashboard very slow to load
body: The dashboard is incredibly slow to load, taking over 1 minute sometimes. This is making the product unusable for our team.

subject: Excellent customer support
body: Just wanted to thank the support team for their quick response to my issue. Problem was resolved within an hour. Outstanding service!

subject: Mobile app crash on iOS
body: App crashes on iOS 16 when trying to upload images. This is a critical issue for our field team who need to upload photos from customer sites.

subject: Need dark mode
body: Would love to see a dark mode option. Working late at night and the bright interface is straining my eyes.

subject: Excel export broken
body: The Excel export feature is completely broken. Files are corrupted and won't open. This is blocking our monthly reporting to executives.

subject: Slack integration broken
body: Slack integration stopped working after the latest update. Not receiving any notifications anymore. This is critical for our workflow.
